title.fieldDescription: This is displayed to the user in the console and shown at the top of the page content when editing.
title.name: ./jcr:title

pagename.fieldDescription: This is used to generate the URI and as such cannot contain any spaces. This does not affect forward facing URL structure. User input for this field is optional. If not specified, the name is derived from the title.
pagename.name: pageName

tagsShowOnCreate.granite:comment: Handled by a custom POST servlet for the Create Page case
tagsShowOnCreate.name: ./cq:tags

isLanguageRoot.fieldDescription: Must be checked if page is the root of a language copy.
isLanguageRoot.name: ./cq:isLanguageRoot

allowedtemplates.fieldDescription: Click 'Add Field' to add a template or a list of templates to be allowed as child pages. Each value in the list must be an absolute path to a template or use '/.*' to allow all templates below this path.

cugconfigwarning.warning:
The Authentication Requirement cannot be edited because the page is using a deprecated configuration for the Closed User Group.
Please refer to the documentation.

enable.fieldDescription: You might need to configure a Closed User Group in the Permission tab.

isNotLinkable.fieldDescription: Must be checked if page needs to be set as Non Linkable
isNotLinkable.name: ./cq:isNotLinkable

isSpecialLink.fieldDescription: Must be checked if the Page needs to be shown as a special link in Navigation
isSpecialLink.name: ./cq:isSpecialLink

globalSeoTitle.fieldDescription: This is the main title of the website which shows in the browser tab. On homepage, this field is the first text to show up in the tab. On internal pages, the SEO Page Title shows up first with with this field appended to the end
globalSeoTitle.name: ./globalSeoTitle

seoTitle.fieldDescription: This is the title specific to each page. When users visit this page, this field will show up in the browser tab with the site's Global SEO Page Title appended to the end.
seoTitle.name: ./seoTitle

alwaysEnglish.fieldDescription: This Field is for Analytics to track the Page Name (must be in English)
alwaysEnglish.name: ./adobeTrackingNameForPage

canonicalUrl.fieldDescription: Configure Canonical Url for the page
canonicalUrl.name: ./canonicalUrl

Keyword.fieldDescription: Configure Meta Keyword for the page
Keyword.name: ./keyword

errorPage.fieldDescription: Configure Error page for the site
errorPage.name: ./errorPages

favIcon.fieldDescription: This is the small icon that shows in a browser tab next to the site name. Fav Icon only needs to be set at the root level of the site
favIcon.name: ./favIcon

langId.fieldDescription: Enter langauage Id for the site locale
langId.name: ./langId

productCategoryNavToggle.fieldDescription: Must be checked to hide Product Category Facets on PLP
productCategoryNavToggle.name: ./FPproductCategoryNavDisplay
productCategoryNavToggle.text: Hide Product Category Facets on PLP

hideRatingInPLP.fieldDescription: Must be checked to hide Ratings and Reviews count on PLP
hideRatingInPLP.name: ./starRatingToggleOnPLP
hideRatingInPLP.text: Hide Ratings and Reviews count on PLP

pTagForProductCount.fieldDescription: Must be checked to show Product count in P tag in PLP
pTagForProductCount.name: ./pTagForProductCount
pTagForProductCount.text: Show Product count in P tag in PLP

atProperty.fieldDescription: Please enter AT Property which will be picked up in Global mbox call and all child pages target components
atProperty.name: ./atProperty

hideInSitemap.fieldDescription: Checking this checkbox will hide current page as well as child pages in sitemap
hideInSitemap.name: ./hideInSitemap

skipInSitemap.fieldDescription: Checking this checkbox will skip/hide current page but will include child pages in sitemap
skipInSitemap.name: ./skipInSitemap

stopInSitemap.fieldDescription: Checking this checkbox will include current page but will exclude child pages in sitemap
stopInSitemap.name: ./stopInSitemap
